trans-unit.source: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it into its owner's hand instead of into that player's graveyard. Draw a card.
{T}, Sacrifice Tormod's Crypt: Exile target player's graveyard.
Dominaria's most extravagant crypt nevertheless holds an empty grave.
When Eternal Witness enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
Gaea needs no book to record every act.

trans-unit.resname: F08·4 | Tendrils of Agony | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)
{T}: Add {G}. {T}: Target 1/1 creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
The limbs of Pendelhaven extend as far as the meek roam, and reach as high as they strive.
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
"Think of this new life not as a gift from the angels but as a command to fight for their cause once more."\n—War blessing of Serra

trans-unit.resname: F08·7 | Wall of Roots | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Defender Put a -0/-1 counter on Wall of Roots: Add {G}. Activate only once each turn.

trans-unit.resname: F08·7 | Wall of Roots | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Root systems in Mwonvuli twist through currents of mana rather than soil.
{T}: Add {C}. {T}: Desert deals 1 damage to target attacking creature. Activate only during the end of combat step.

trans-unit.resname: F08·9 | Thirst for Knowledge | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.

trans-unit.resname: F08·9 | Thirst for Knowledge | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Raissa transformed herself into a vessel for the Watchword Codex, allowing the arcane lore to flow through her body.

Serrated Arrows enters the battlefield with three arrowhead counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are no arrowhead counters on Serrated Arrows, sacrifice it. {T}, Remove an arrowhead counter from Serrated Arrows: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

Imprint — When Isochron Scepter enters the battlefield, you may exile an instant card with mana value 2 or less from your hand. {2}, {T}: You may copy the exiled card. If you do, you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact. Shrapnel Blast deals 5 damage to any target.
To the Krark Clan, every artifact has a trigger and a barrel.
